apartment.01: This cozy apartment is equipped with three separate fixed beds, ideal for small groups or friends. It offers a comfortable and quiet environment with its own barrier-free entrance. Guests can enjoy satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The bathroom is equipped with a shower. The apartment is a great choice for those seeking comfort and a simple, practical space.
apartment.02: Spacious apartment with a King size double bed and one fixed bed offers plenty of space for families or larger groups. In addition to comfort, the apartment has its own barrier-free entrance, ensuring easy access. The room is equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. Includes a bathroom with a shower. This apartment is ideal for those who want comfortable and spacious accommodation with all amenities.
apartment.03: Elegant apartment with a King size double bed provides a pleasant environment for couples. Equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The bathroom offers a modern shower. This apartment is suitable for guests seeking comfort and tranquility during their stay.
apartment.04: This apartment is equipped with a King size double bed and two fixed beds, providing ample space for families or groups of friends. Amenities include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The apartment also has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. The bathroom is modernly furnished with a shower. The apartment offers comfortable accommodation for all travelers.
apartment.05: This cozy apartment with a King size double bed and one fixed bed provides pleasant accommodation for smaller groups or families. The apartment is equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. A bathroom with a shower is available. This apartment is an ideal choice for guests seeking comfortable and cozy accommodation.
apartment.06: This spacious apartment with a King size double bed and three fixed beds provides comfortable accommodation for families or groups of friends. The apartment is equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The bathroom offers a shower. This apartment is ideal for guests who want to spend their stay in a quiet part of town with plenty of space.
apartment.07: This spacious apartment with a King size double bed and three fixed beds provides comfortable accommodation for families or groups of friends. apartment.08: This stylish apartment with a King size double bed and one fixed bed is ideal for smaller groups or families. In the apartment, you will find satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The bathroom is equipped with a modern shower. The apartment offers peace and comfort for all guests.
apartment.09: This cozy apartment is equipped with two fixed beds and is ideal for couples or friends. It offers satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a wardrobe. The apartment includes a bathroom with a shower. Perfect choice for those seeking a peaceful and comfortable accommodation for two.
